title: Olympic postponement one more obstacle for resilient Canadian athlete to overcome
description: Earlier this month, when Canada’s Women’s Softball Team held training camp in Halifax, Nova Scotia in preparation for the 2020 Olympic Games in Japan, Sara Groenewegen was in peak form and her teammates were in phenomenal shape.
